channel.title: Sections on Ilgin Dogan
channel.description: Recent content in Sections on Ilgin Dogan

item.description: I am a Ph.D. candidate in Industrial Engineering and Operations Research (IEOR) at the University of California, Berkeley (UCB). My academic advisors are Anil Aswani and Zuo-Jun Max Shen. Prior to joining UCB, I received B.S. and M.S. degrees in Industrial Engineering at the Middle East Technical University.
